title: Social workers; prohibit licensing board from requiring certain exam for applicants for a license by reciprocity.
subject: Business and Commerce
Public Health and Human Services

actions.description: Referred To Business and Commerce;Public Health and Human Services

extras.summary: AN ACT TO AMEND SECTION 73-53-13, MISSISSIPPI CODE OF 1972, TO PROHIBIT THE BOARD OF EXAMINERS FOR SOCIAL WORKERS AND MARRIAGE AND FAMILY THERAPISTS FROM REQUIRING A WRITTEN JURISPRUDENCE EXAMINATION SPECIFIC TO THE STATE LAWS THAT REGULATE SOCIAL WORKERS FOR APPLICANTS FOR A LICENSE BY RECIPROCITY WHO ESTABLISH RESIDENCE IN THIS STATE; TO AMEND SECTION 73-50-2, MISSISSIPPI CODE OF 1972, TO CONFORM TO THE PRECEDING PROVISION; AND FOR RELATED PURPOSES.
